comment:
>>44295494

“So, what of our bonus Gem?” You ask your party. You and Aelriss exchange nervous glances.

“I already got an extra.” Nel says. “So it's between you guys, if that narrows it down. I'd be inclined to give it to Ashe for being such a cool leader.”

“Seconded.” Donnel says. “Count me out, I've been pretty useless compared to Andor and Kainzo, and gotten more than my share already. The opportunity to drag ass with you guys is more than I could ask for right now.”

“Don't be like that.” Aelriss says, gritting her teeth. “What about Tatsumaki? She totally deserves it too. Being totally on-fuckin'-point, like, all day."

The cat-eared brawler shrugs, but her face doesn't match her posture.

> Lobby for the bonus Gem.
> Let them sort it out.
name: Sylvetica
